name: Topologix
description:
Made as a 7 week long assignment for a digital games course on the brazilian university PUC-SP Consolação, Topologix is a puzzle based 3D platformer focused on its unique object grabbing mechanic. Travel through 5 different stages while using geometric forms to reach new locations and solve puzzles.

CONTROLS

WASD to walk. Tap Space for a short jump, press Space for a high jump.

E interacts with yellow geometric forms in three different ways. When interacting with a nearby object, E makes the player grab it and drag it around. When the object is further away, E stores the object in the player's backpack. When outside of grab range and with a stored object, E takes the geometric form out of the backpack, allowing it to be used again.

R changes the shape and functionality of the stored object.
